title: I'm Building the BEST Open Source AI Coding Assistant with YOUR Help
description:
Every AI content creator and their mom has put out a video on Bolt.new. It makes sense - Bolt.new is an incredible open source platform to build full stack apps with AI. So I've done something way different with it that you WON'T see anywhere else AND it's a way for us to work on something awesome together as a community!

I forked Bolt.new and made it way better by fixing the two problems I have with the platform: it costs too much (and those annoying token limits) and you can only ever use one LLM.

I already made a video introducing this Bolt.new fork, so in this video I cover all the improvements that have been made both by me and all of you! This fork is turning into a community project and I am so stoked about that! I also talk about future work for the project and my vision for it, pretty exciting stuff :D

This is available for you to download and use below right now! My gift to you :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

00:00 - Intro - We're Building Something Incredible
02:05 - Overview of the Bolt.new Fork
03:34 - Showcasing the Amazing Community Improvements
09:01 - Demoing the New & Improved Bolt.new Fork
10:54 - Future Improvements for the Project
15:45 - Outro

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Here is the link to Bolt.diy (this fork which was originally called oTToDev) on GitHub. Check out the README to see future improvements planned!

https://github.com/stackblitz-labs/bolt.diy

Install Ollama to run any local LLM you could dream of as an AI coding assistant for free:

https://ollama.com/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Artificial Intelligence is no doubt the future of not just software development but the whole world. And I'm on a mission to master it - focusing first on mastering AI Agents.

Join me as I push the limits of what is possible with AI. I'll be uploading videos at least two times a week - Sundays and Wednesdays at 7:00 PM CDT! Sundays and Wednesdays are for everything AI, focusing on providing insane and practical educational value. I will also post sometimes on Fridays at 7:00 PM CDT - specifically for platform showcases - sometimes sponsored, always creative in approach!
